alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Lower Jefferson; Northern Jasper; Northern Newton; Northern Orange; Southern Jasper; Southern Newton; Southern Orange; Tyler; Upper Jefferson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 29 at 3:02PM CDT until August 30 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...FIRE DANGER RESUMES WEDNESDAY... ...BURN BAN CONTINUES FOR ALL OF LOUISIANA AND SOUTHEAST TEXAS... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 8 PM CDT WEDNESDAY FOR LOW HUMIDITY...VERY DRY FUELS...AND GUSTY WINDS... FOR ALL OF SOUTHEAST TEXAS...AS WELL AS ALL OF CENTRAL AND SOUTHWEST LOUISIANA AND PORTIONS OF SOUTH CENTRAL LOUISIANA... * AFFECTED AREA...Vernon, Rapides, Avoyelles, Beauregard, Allen, Evangeline, St. Landry, Lafayette, Upper St. Martin, Lower St. Martin, West Cameron, East Cameron, Northern Calcasieu, Northern Jefferson Davis, Northern Acadia, Upper Vermilion, Upper Iberia, Upper St. Mary, Tyler, Hardin, Southern Calcasieu, Southern Jefferson Davis, Southern Acadia, Northern Jasper, Northern Newton, Southern Jasper, Southern Newton, Upper Jefferson, Northern Orange, Lower Jefferson and Southern Orange. * TIMING...10 AM until 8 PM Wednesday. * WINDS...Sustained northerly to NNE winds 10 to 15 with gusts upto 25 MPH. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...25 to 35%. * TEMPERATURES...95 to 100F. * LIGHTNING...Less than a 10% chance of showers and storms acrossSETX and SWLA with isolated afternoon thunderstorms. Lightning could strike far from the storm center. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Burn bans are in effect across Louisiana and Southeast Texas.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
